trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_group" name="group" href=""></xref> element with <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> attribute from the XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_group" name="group" href=""></xref>具有項目<xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""> </xref> World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 所指定的 XML 結構描述的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class is used within complex types that reference a <xref uid="langword_csharp_group" name="group" href=""></xref> defined at the <xref uid="langword_csharp_schema" name="schema" href=""></xref> level.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用在參考的複雜型別<xref uid="langword_csharp_group" name="group" href=""></xref>在定義<xref uid="langword_csharp_schema" name="schema" href=""></xref>層級。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroupRef"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroupRef"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets one of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence"></xref> classes, which holds the post-compilation value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Particle" name="Particle" href=""></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得其中<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence"></xref>類別，其中包含編譯後值的<xref uid="langword_csharp_Particle" name="Particle" href=""></xref>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The post-compilation value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Particle" name="Particle" href=""></xref> property, which is one of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: 編譯後值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Particle" name="Particle" href=""></xref>屬性，這是其中一個的<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a group defined in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此結構描述 （或另一個指定的命名空間指示的結構描述） 中定義的群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `RefName` value must be a QName.
The `RefName` can include a namespace prefix.
To include a group in a `complexType` element, use the `RefName` attribute to specify the group to include in this schema.
trans-unit.target: 若要在群組`complexType`項目，使用`RefName`屬性來指定要包含在這個結構描述中的群組。

trans-unit.source: The name of a group defined in this schema.
trans-unit.target: 此結構描述中定義的群組名稱。
